channel.title: Tom on The Williams Kids – Dillan ♥ Ashley ♥ Dwyane ♥ Bruce
channel.description: Recent content in Tom on The Williams Kids – Dillan ♥ Ashley ♥ Dwyane ♥ Bruce

item.title: Status Update – April 20, 2019
item.description: Got Bruce’s backpack, good grades also, Dillan our only worry. Drove to Fortville for annual Dellinger Dinner and Easter Egg Hunt, kids had lots of fun even though it rained all day. Went to my parents for Easter Dinner, everyone snacked since we just ate. Looked at three houses.

item.title: Status Update – December 29, 2018
item.description: Seems like kids fought all day. Lesa did eggs for “Devil” eggs, I took out three bags trash. Christmas at my mom and dad’s in Indy, kids had lots of fun playing with cousins. Yahtzee with kids, then by ourselves after kids’ bedtime. Marcy Cook texted about a villa in French Lick.

item.title: Status Update – November 23, 2018
item.description: Worked 4 hours, maps done. Ashley went with, played with/babysat Addie. Back home set up tables, hung a couple pictures, replaced kid’s faucet. Williams Thanksgiving successful thanks to Lesa! Becky’s kids getting bigger like ours! They played well together. Watched Wizard of Oz.

item.title: Status Update – March 31, 2018
item.description: Bruce’s throat swollen/red, doctor visit, has strep throat. Late start for Easter 2018 in Fortville, ate dinner, had Easter egg hunt, kids had good time! Avery and Bonnie Dellinger’s 50th anniversary. Left early, Easter dinner at parents; Jim, Sarah and Kaleigh, Becky and family.

item.title: Status Update – April 5, 2015
item.description: Deacon breakfast. Easter Bunny came! Ashley, Dwyane, and Bruce sing song at church. Dave’s family drive down to visit. Cook out. Great day.
